articles.description: A dancer has gone viral for all the wrong reasons after people spotted something sinister on his stairs that many believe is an intruder.

articles.title: A slide & $900 weights: 8 details we spotted in celeb homes during the Together At Home concert. - Mamamia
articles.description: From very expensive Versace weights to a colour coordinated book shelf, here's what we spied in celebrity homes during Together At Home concert.
articles.content:

John Legend performed Stand By Me from his grand piano as a duet with Sam Smith, but behind him, his huge wall of awards really stole the show.
